dataList.dlg: If it is fire you need, I will provide it.
My eyes opened because it was time to wake up. There is no need to be amazed by how early I rise.
In my spare time, I help others with their training. I only did it for one person at first, but as time went on, it became a regular routine.
I can brighten your surroundings if you dislike the dark. My fire is the brightest in Section 6.
If thing are not going well... you start by carefully examining the problem.
Others often assess my infrequency of speech as stifling. As it is not a negative factor, I am not making active effort to rectify it.
I arrived here and met you because it was time... Similarly, we will be able to find the Golden Bough when the right time arrives.
Judging from the managerial experience so far, someone of your caliber should be able to create a fire with ease. If you want...
Don't let your loss of memory distract you too much. I'm certain the moment of recovery will come naturally.
You may leave me if you're urgently needed.
I will strive to become a keener flame.
If it's a fire you wish.
If you need this fire of mine.
Is it not progressing well?
Follow my fire.
It seems to have gone well.
Nkh!
It's a natural outcome.
If only the fire was more intense...
I lit the path as required.
Fires are susceptible to winds.
I was able to see where to strike.
Yes, I was fond of the fire I managed to ignite now.
It's alright. I grasped the problem.
